commit message:
Features and UI

Added features, better UI, error handling, and comments

UI Overhaul and first version

Now published on Google Play version 1.0
Can now save samples to external storage
Added action bar button to delete local sounds
Added action bar button to delete local sounds
Added action bar button to delete all local sounds
Complete overhaul of app. Switched to SoundPools and updated the UI
Fixed looping bug and put a maximum sound limit
Switched to AudioRecord, now recording and playing is near instant, but files are saved as .pcm
Enabled large heap to prevent memory problems on low-end phones
Fixed UI bugs and prevented rapid button presses from crashing app
Improved performance, code reorganization, and external audio file support
Adjusted rapid press threshold + some layout modifications
Fixed Lollipop bug where audio does not stop
Hot fix for crashing on some phones when deleting
